page.title: 19 Meadowbank
page.content: Meadowbank is a small village with one corner shop, one garage and no school as it has closed down. It has a beef farm just down the road opposite the salt mine. Just down the road, the other way from the village are two bridges, one leading on to an island and one leading to the otherside of the river. Quite a few people come to this stretch of the river, apart from there being private caravans on the hill behind the river, it is a pretty place, good for picnics and fishing. This little island is virtually in Meadowbank. Meadowbank is five minutes in the car from the shopping centre.
